entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then north 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
